subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 27 points, Nene added 17 and the Denver Nuggets dealt the visiting Nets their 14th consecutive loss to start the season with a 101-87 win Tuesday night.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 27 points, Nene added 17 and the Denver Nuggets dealt the visiting Nets their 14th consecutive loss to start the season with a 101-87 win Tuesday night.
